name: Complete
headline: The complete way to do compensation
description: The complete way to communicate compensation, starting with our interactive offer letters.

# Compensation without the headache
Complete empowers you to create, collaborate on, and explain compensation practices from day zero.
[Request a demo](https://complete.so/</request-demo>)

## Complete helps teams make compensation _a winning advantage_
**120+ integrations**
**Real-time HRIS, ATS, and Cap Table integrations**
**1 platform**
**Platform for the whole team: your CEO, executives, manager, employees, and candidates**
**100% confidence**
**Build confidence in your processes and data around your most important asset: your people**
Planning
## Comp planning, without the spreadsheets
Get out of error prone spreadsheets and drive a customized and educational experience with your compensation planners.Model different scenarios before committing to your budget, built-in approval chains, and planner education to most effectively use spend.
[Learn more about compensation planning![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62e16ef2d63bf53d63b97430_arow.svg)](https://complete.so/</planning-budgeting>)
leveling & bands
## Level your organization
Career progression should be celebrated, not overwhelming. Construct, edit, and draft levels that match your organization as you scale.Match compensation data to benchmarking data, create equitable compensation bands, and visualize employees alongside critical compensation data — all in one place.
[See how leveling and bands work![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62e16ef2d63bf53d63b97430_arow.svg)](https://complete.so/</leveling>)
total rewards
# Improve retention through proactive communication
Make sure your employees have an offer to stay: a full understanding of their compensation — across different equity grants, benefits, bonuses, and more.Drive education and visibility into your compensation philosophy. 
[Learn more about total rewards![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62e16ef2d63bf53d63b97430_arow.svg)](https://complete.so/</employee-rewards>)
interactive offers
## Close top talent
Win top talent at the offer stage by creating a customized offer portal for your candidates. Allow them to visualize their long-term value across equity, benefits, salary, equity refreshes, and more!
[See an interactive offer and learn more![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62e16ef2d63bf53d63b97430_arow.svg)](https://complete.so/</offers>)

Integrations
# Real time source of truth with 100+ HRIS, ATS, and equity integrations
From your data, ATS, and HRIS, secure live data connections, update your candidate and employee pools as you go.
[See all of our integrations![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62e16ef2d63bf53d63b97430_arow.svg)](https://complete.so/</integrations>)
# Customerstories
Excellent  4.7 out of 5
A must-have for high growth teams
Complete has been an incredible partner in the recruiting process and has helped us close crucial candidates. The presentation of the offer especially helps candidates understand how valuable their equity is and why our team wants them to join!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62fda613a6457491e17342f6_image%202.webp)
Anish Dhar
CEO and Co-founder, Cortex
Unmatched total compensation understanding
As a founder, it’s important to me that every candidate understands their compensation & role at our company. Comp — especially equity comp — is really complex, and Complete enables us to communicate clearly and consistently to every candidate, while staying fun & in line with our values!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62fda60ca645746d777342a5_image%201.webp)
Neal Jean
CEO and Co-founder, Beacons
Enabling teams with superpowers
Complete has been a superpower for our talent and HR teams to make educated and consistent compensation decisions. The ability to put our best foot forward with every candidates allows us to begin our trust and transparency with employees at a whole new degree.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62e16ef1d63bf53422b973f4/62fda61c3094956fa28b4d1d_image%203%20\(1\).webp)
Jess Park
VP of People, TrueNorth

## Level your organization
Career progression should be celebrated, not overwhelming. Construct, edit, and draft levels that match your organization as you scale.Match compensation data to benchmarking data, create equitable compensation bands, and visualize employees alongside critical compensation data — all in one place.
See how leveling and bands work![Arrow⟨29⟩](https://complete.so/</leveling>)
total rewards
# Improve retention through proactive communication
Make sure your employees have an offer to stay: a full understanding of their compensation — across different equity grants, benefits, bonuses, and more.Drive education and visibility into your compensation philosophy. 
Learn more about total rewards![Arrow⟨29⟩](https://complete.so/</employee-rewards>)
interactive offers
## Close top talent
Win top talent at the offer stage by creating a customized offer portal for your candidates. Allow them to visualize their long-term value across equity, benefits, salary, equity refreshes, and more!
See an interactive offer and learn more![Arrow⟨29⟩](https://complete.so/</offers>)

generated_description:
### Company Summary: Complete

**Name**: Complete  
**Founded**: 2021  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 5 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W22  

#### Mission
Complete aims to revolutionize the way companies handle compensation, encapsulating their vision in the phrase: "The complete way to do compensation." 

#### What They Do
Initially, Complete focused on improving the communication of compensation through interactive offer letters. Now, they've expanded their offerings to support businesses with various aspects of compensation management. Their tools not only aid in creating personalized and transparent offer letters, but also include features for:

- **Team Leveling**: Craft frameworks that help align company values with compensation decisions.  
- **Planning**: Utilize real-time alerts and filters to make informed compensation adjustments.
- **Team Monitoring**: Get a comprehensive overview of employees' compensation, ensuring alignment and fairness.
- **Total Rewards**: Help employees visualize the full value of their compensation package.
- **Interactive Offers**: Provide candidates with tailored digital offers that illustrate their potential value to the company.

#### Target Audience
Complete caters to a diverse range of executives, including Chief People Officers, Chief Financial Officers, and Chief Executive Officers. They aim to ensure that compensation is both fair and motivating, supporting businesses from inception through their growth to IPO.

#### Recognition 
The platform has received positive feedback for simplifying complex compensation structures, leading to a stellar customer rating of 4.7 out of 5. They count high-growth teams like DataStax, Cortex, and Vercel among their clients.

#### Technology Integration
Complete offers over **120 integrations** with various HRIS, ATS, and cap table systems, ensuring real-time, accurate data across platforms.

#### Websites and Resources
For more information on their solutions, visit [Complete's official website](https://complete.so). The site offers insights into their products, philosophy, and a pathway to demo their services.

---

In essence, Complete is not just about compensation—it’s about transforming it into a strategic advantage for growing teams. With their robust platform, they empower organizations to be more transparent, equitable, and effective in managing the most important asset they have: their people.
